text:
<@U13GPDA1F> Just to clarify what keep the ‘lyndsay’ style is, is that mean to stick one of those colorway tiles in at the end of the list? Or are they giving us a new style to keep around?
It was built to pull over selected legacy styles and not mix and match , it won’t be a quick fix to add in arbitrary legacy style+colors (but anything using the new tile service will be an easy addition to the list).
or would they be able to generate a new style that uses that lindsay style?
im not sure - hoping for clarification from bonnie via that email i just sent
but good to know that its a bit more complicated than i initially thought :grimacing:
sounds good. More just wanting to clarify, I was just thinking about that.
yeah lets see what we hear and we can huddle then about next steps
Sounds good, hopefully they would be able to add it as part of that list. I had to special case pulling over the legacy style+color so that they would be maintained.
but besides that style addtion/removal, the build is ready for an internal test if you want me to put that up on here. It has all the other changes/fixes

sure - can you be sure to test all of the changes in the build before sharing? and please just label “internal” so it doesnt get confused with the later builds we’ll deliver to clients once we get an answer on those styles
<@U13GPDA1F|lynsey> uploaded a file: <https://uncorked.slack.com/files/lynsey/F4LPSM6ET/2017-03-17.png|remove this style> and commented: <@U3ZFEAPSP> this one needs to be removed

initial_comment.comment: <@U3ZFEAPSP> this one needs to be removed

text: we’ll need a new style added but need a tile for it
it will be same colors as “lindsay” but called Pink Blue and Gold
will do. I’ve been testing through the cases, and so far is working as expected, but just testing more paths.
For the new one I would also need what the simpleStyle value for it would be

requested new style info (icon, value) for “Pink Blue Gold” - we’ll continue with “Lindsay” as legacy. we wont deliver a build to the client until we have that, but lets do some internal testing of the build in advance so we can just plug in when we get it (sounds like Monday)
<@U3ZFEAPSP|oliver> uploaded a file: <https://uncorked.slack.com/files/oliver/F4LQ8E2SJ/places-updates-3-17.apk|places-updates-3-17.apk>

^should only show the new styles dialog when updating, not fresh install.
Removed blue/red style.
Caches preview tiles and should be noticeably quicker
plus the cached full screen preview bug fix for MLC-146
<@U2H61EJSG> can you test this? beyond the updates oliver made, possible to do a quick smoke test of the other generators (and midoris trends update)
im heading into another meeting:upside_down_face:
I’m on it!
thank you both so much!

Everything is looking good! The preview images are loading faster and Midori’s UI update is in place. I did notice, however, that there are two overlapping circle progress indicators in ‘set wallpaper’.
hmmm- can you share a screenshot of that?
<@U3ZFEAPSP> looks like we might need to update that - summer can show you but its our spinner overlapping the OS spinner

so looking into that double progress bar issue, it currently exists on the app in develop. We are going out to the Android set wallpaper service which is showing the OS progress bar when loading, then our GLRenderer for the wallpaper will make its own progress spinner when making a background call, I don’t think this will be something I would be able to fix quickly/still getting familiar with the GL code, but I wouldn’t want to knock something out while fixing that. I can check it out, but not sure what your thoughts are with this being something that already exists or not?
oh wow. didnt know the OS was tossing a progress spinner up

yea, just one of the small ones when firing this intent up, “android.service.wallpaper.CHANGE_LIVE_WALLPAPER”;
I’m not sure what it is waiting to load from because the timing on the two spinners are offset

<@U13GPDA1F> I have all the builds with the new version names/numbers, the only thing is that I don’t think the new style has propagated to all their servers, sometimes on the tilerequest I get the red/blue other times the correct lindsay style. Same with our preview image, the preview image in the google cloud storage is the pink/blue/gold but requesting it is still giving the red/blue (and I tried hitting refresh on the console thinking maybe that would force update the servers…)
None of that has any effect on the build though, but we would want to message that to the googlers
sweet
if you + summer feel good about the builds we can go ahead and toss them up to the folder - let me know what you think (im about to run into a meeting for an hour)
should I go upload those builds
yea, I think so, I’ll put em up
awesome. please take a spin through the builds themselves (since sometimes wonkiness gets in) + then upload them!
let me know and i can shoot a note over to bonnie
uploaded, doubled back over some smoke tests, looked ok
awesome
i let bonnie know! woo hoo!

<@U2H61EJSG> on monday can you take another pass at systems health. bonnie highlighted some areas that need to be updated/addressed (sorry to ping you post-5pm on friday, no immediate action needed, i just didnt want to forget to mention)
Will do!
